refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, PacketFramework] = ld_SendPacketInclSub(sim, PacketFramework, Signal, NValues_send, datatype, SourceName, SubPluginUname, SubBlock)

para.para: Stream data - block including a subscibtion to a plugin
NValues_send - the vector length of Signal
SourceName - a unique string identifier descring the stream
SubPluginUname - a unique string identifier describing the plugin
